19.text: During the Christmas special the Crawleys are in their London house

22.text: preparing for Rose's coming out ball and the summer season.

26.text: All of the interiors at Grantham House were filmed here at Basildon Park

29.text: We are now in the Octagon room which is one of my

33.text: because a lot of the action takes place here
